description: Canonical SNQI weights derived on synthetic fixture dataset (simplex OFF).

rationale.why_simplex_off: Retain original relative scaling freedom; early empirical search showed simplex projection compressed discriminative variance on small datasets.
rationale.selection_rule: Chose recommended (grid_search) configuration maximizing heuristic objective under seed=123 with validation enabled.
rationale.stability_note: Fixture has perfect stability (Spearman=1) so discriminative component saturates; larger real datasets expected to reduce potential degeneracy.
